name: Banisher (One_Eyed_Gamer)
description:
How to play:

Move with Arrows and shoot with Space.

The Ghost will hunt you if it sees you.

Find crosses to shoot it with to temporarily banish it for a few seconds. It will respawn randomly.

Every box of crosses you pick up gives you 5 shots. Collect 5 boxes to win.

You have 3 lives... Good Luck
